description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, focusing on transforming education and knowledge sharing. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he combines entrepreneurship, thinking, and coding. His work spans traditional and non-traditional education, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. yeehaa's involvement in tech and education initiatives includes the Dutch Internet Society and Public Spaces Coalition. Based in Taipei, he brings people together around common values, creating effective ecosystems. His blog post "Across Space And Time" explores the concept of ecosystems in biology and organizations, while his course "Groom Your Ecosystem" offers unique steps for fostering cohesive environments, emphasizing leadership, adaptability, innovation, and aesthetics.
blurb: Biological ecosystems are specific to space and time, but the term 'ecosystem' has been broadened to describe non-natural organizations, underscoring a shift towards organic, decentralized structures.
